Package de.dhbw.ravensburg.zuul.creature

Class Human

java.lang.Object
de.dhbw.ravensburg.zuul.creature.Creature
de.dhbw.ravensburg.zuul.creature.Human
Direct Known Subclasses:
Mage, Native
public class Human
extends Creature
Class Human - an human in an adventure game. This class is part of the "World of Zuul" application. "World of Zuul" is a very simple, text based adventure game. A "Human" can be a Magier or an Native. They have different abilities and can help or attack you. "Human" is a subclass from "Creature" and uses two constructors of "Creature". "Human" is the superclass from "Magier" and "Native".
Version:
2020.05.02
Author:
Moritz Link

    Create a human with different values: name, innocent, drop.It calls the constructor from the superclass "Creature".

  • Constructor Details

    • Human

      public Human​(java.lang.String name, boolean innocent, Item drop)
      Create a human with different values: name, innocent, drop.It calls the constructor from the superclass "Creature". This constructor is used for "Native".
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the Human.
      innocent - If the human is innocent.
      drop - the Item the human drops when it dies.

    • Human

      public Human​(java.lang.String name, boolean innocent)
      Create a human with different values: name, innocent. It calls the constructor from the superclass "Creature". This constructor is used for "Magier".
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the human.
      innocent - If the human is innocent.
